snippet: The attack in the tribal areas came as peace talks between the Pakistani government and the Taliban have been faltering.
abstract: Explosion hits Pakistani Army convoy, killing at least nine soldiers and critically injuring several others; attack comes as peace talks between the Pakistani government and Taliban insurgents have been faltering.

byline.original: By IHSANULLAH TIPU MEHSUD and SALMAN MASOOD

lead_paragraph: The attack in the tribal areas came as peace talks between the Pakistani government and the Taliban have been faltering.

headline.main: Blast Hits Pakistani Army Convoy, Killing 9 Soldiers
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Attack on Army Unit Kills 9
